CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Aromatic imides such as rylene diimides are one of the classical n - type building blocks and can exhibit relatively high electron affinities , high electron mobilities , and excellent chemical , thermal , and photochemical stabilities.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| rylene diimides |
| aromatic imides |

The two "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "rylene diimides" and "aromatic imides".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| rylene diimides |
| aromatic imides |

The two valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are "rylene diimides" and "aromatic imides". The term "n-type building blocks" is not considered a material name in this context, as it is a general category of materials rather than a specific material.
